name: men-agent
author: Monitorr
description: An Electron.js desktop agent (system tray app) for our employee monitoring platform MonitorR

scripts.dev: tsc && xcopy src\auth\login.html dist\auth\ /Y && xcopy src\streaming\stream.html dist\streaming\ /Y && xcopy src\capture\record.html dist\capture\ /Y && electron .
scripts.build: tsc && xcopy src\auth\login.html dist\auth\ /Y && xcopy src\streaming\stream.html dist\streaming\ /Y && xcopy src\capture\record.html dist\capture\ /Y && electron-builder
scripts.build:win: tsc && xcopy src\auth\login.html dist\auth\ /Y && xcopy src\streaming\stream.html dist\streaming\ /Y && xcopy src\capture\record.html dist\capture\ /Y && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: tsc && xcopy src\auth\login.html dist\auth\ /Y && xcopy src\streaming\stream.html dist\streaming\ /Y && xcopy src\capture\record.html dist\capture\ /Y && electron-builder --mac
